alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:32PM CDT until June 16 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GARVIN...NORTHERN SEMINOLE...SOUTHEASTERN OKLAHOMA...LINCOLN...CLEVELAND...POTTAWATOMIE AND SOUTHERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 1031 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Paden to 3 miles east of Brooksville to 5 miles west of Maysville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Norman, Shawnee, Seminole, Tecumseh, Purcell, Chandler, Noble, Harrah, Slaughterville, McLoud, Stroud, Prague, Lexington, Pink, Meeker, Maud, Davenport, Wayne, and Earlsboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
